node.description: In the book of the Revelation, there are many powerful truths that God has longed revealed to His people—especially for these times. At the peak of its chiastic structure, when the dramatic climax of the Great Controversy is realized, John exclaims, “And I saw…”  What did he see? What did God reveal? The revelator saw the fulfillment of the greatest commandment ever given to man—“Go into all the world and preach the gospel to every creature” (Mark 16:15). In this seminar we will discuss the importance of not only understanding, but also experiencing and sharing, the Three Angels’ Messages as God intended.
